text: Sihamte prthiraita bhramana karaa na'ine? Tetiyahe sihamte dekhilehemtena ye, sihamtara purbarartisakalara dasa ki haichila, saktita sihamta achila ihamtatakaiyo prabala, sihamte mati caha'ichila, arau sihamte ihamtara abadatakaiyo bechi abada karaichila. Sihamtara ocarata sihamtara raachulasakala suspasta pramanasaha ahichila. Prakrtate allaha ene nahaya ye, te'om sihamtara prati an'yaya karaiche baram sihamta nije'i nijara prati an'yaya karaichila
